If Until the End of Time (2007r.) B'Day Deluxe Edition CD track listing Flaws and All (7) If (8) Get Me Bodied (Extended Mix) (9) If is an R&B; ballad by Beyoncé Knowles. The song is her final single from her second album B'Day: Deluxe Edition.Single information from official fan club. The song was most likely chosen due to the fact that originally it was not available in the U.S. as it was an international track, but due to the Des'ree law suit, the U.S. version of the album with the track "Still In Love (Kissing You)" was replaced by a version with "If". A CD single of the song was created for her official fan club and is available for purchase from their online store. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:R&B; songs Category:Beyoncé songs
